mapper.select: select SUM(money) s_m,DATE_FORMAT(trading_time,'%Y %m') f_d from transaction_record tr JOIN meter m ON tr.meter=m.meter_number left join `user` u on tr.`user`=u.user_account WHERE meter IN (select meter_number from meter WHERE branch_number=#{branchNumber}) group BY DATE_FORMAT(trading_time,'%Y %m');
